2.「よいところに 来てくれた……。| すまぬが わしに手を貸してくれ。| 困ったこ: You've come to the right place... but I'm|afraid you'll have to help me. I'm in|trouble...

60.「だが その戦いのさなか……| ホルタは 命を落としてしまった……。| そして: But in the heat of battle Holta lost his life|and on his deathbed he said. ...

He wants us to pretend that his daughter,|Lunana, died of a disease so that she can live|her life without being consumed by the desire|
